thread.title: Oscar Isaac and Keegan-Michael Key Will Star in ‘Hamlet’ at the Public Theater
thread.title_full: Oscar Isaac and Keegan-Michael Key Will Star in ‘Hamlet’ at the Public Theater

author: JOSHUA BARONE
title: Oscar Isaac and Keegan-Michael Key Will Star in ‘Hamlet’ at the Public Theater
text: Oscar Isaac will play the title role in “Hamlet” at the Public Theater , which runs June 20 through Sept. 3. Credit David McNew/Reuters Sam Gold’s “Hamlet” is happening, after all. The Tony-winning director’s embattled but nonetheless highly anticipated staging of the Shakespeare tragedy, which made headlines last summer when it was canceled at one nonprofit theater and taken to another, will run at the Public Theater from June 20 through Sept. 3, with Oscar Isaac in the title role, the Public announced on Thursday. Photo Sam Gold, who will direct this “Hamlet.” Credit Emily Andrews   Other cast members include Keegan-Michael Key, of Key and Peele fame, in his New York stage debut as Horatio. This “Hamlet” was originally meant to close the current season   Audience ’s   in Brooklyn. It had been in production since 2014, but Mr. Gold parted ways with the theater — in particular its artistic director, Jeffrey Horowitz — last June over artistic differences.
